title: Linux ctags Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the power of the ctags command in Linux, learn how to generate tags for C/C++ projects, and navigate source code efficiently.

meta.title: Linux ctags Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the power of the ctags command in Linux, learn how to generate tags for C/C++ projects, and navigate source code efficiently.
meta.keywords: ctags, Linux, C, C++, source code navigation, code indexing, programming, scripting

verify.name: Verify ctags installation
verify.hint: Ensure that the ctags package is installed correctly.

steps.title: Generating Tags for a C/C++ Project

verify.name: Verify tags file generation
verify.hint: Ensure that the tags file is generated correctly in the `~/project/myproject` directory.

verify.name: Verify navigation with ctags
verify.hint: Ensure that the tags file contains the definition of the `main` function, and that you can navigate to it using the ctags command.
